name: Dominique Morgan
coverLetter:
Currently I work as a district manger for a large corporate juice chain. I have always been excited, passionate and interested in cannabis and its development in the business world. I believe in its medical properties and I am completely open and will to start at any position to gain experience and insight. 

I may not having trimming experience but I can assure you that I am responsible and a quick learner. I have a 2 week time frame to begin working.

Shelter maybe needed if job is located outside of Los Angeles. Also, I am not picky about living conditions.
